ISSUE.TITLE: Search customers by "Registration" (from and to) and "Last activity" dates
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Let's add two new date filters on the "Customers" page in admin area. Filter customers by `LastActivityDateUtc` property (from and to). The field names will be "Last activity from" and "Last activity to". Originally suggested in https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/91632/search-for-active-customers-only Also, add new other fields to filter customers - "Registration date from" and "Registration date to". They will use the `CreatedOnUtc` property

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5947 Search customers by last activity and registration dates (#6119)
